title: Flow Rate Converter (Volume) | Conversions Flow Rate

formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: Base: this tool uses m³/s internally. 1 L = 1×10−3 m³ 1 US gal = 3.785411784 L 1 Imp gal = 4.54609 L 1 ft³ = 0.028316846592 m³ 1 in³ = 1.6387064×10−5 m³
